attributes.action: Parliament to Impeach Tony Blair for  illegally invading Iraq and war crimes.
attributes.background: Tony Blair had gotten away with the illegal invasion of a country causing the deaths of many people and our British Soldiers and need to answer for his actions in light of the Chillcott Report.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept a petition calling for impeachment because this procedure is now considered obsolete. It is not therefore clear what action could be taken on this petition. 
 
This note explains the history of impeachment and the current position: 

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-7612
